overview: Playboy supplied cameras -- and a bevy of sizzling beauties -- to top-selling rappers Ja Rule, Nelly, Xzibit and DMX and patriot rockers Motley Crue's Tommy Lee, Poison's Bret Michaels, Korn's Jonathan Davis and Disturbed's David Draiman
tagline: Platinum Bad Boys Become Playboy Photographers!
title: Hip Hop & Rock
